name: 42nd Street Photo
description: 42nd Street Photo is a Camera Store.
overview:
42nd Street Photo carries a wide variety of digital cameras, digital audio, and video equipment. We always aim to please our customers, and our history shows it. With over 50 years in the camera industry, we pride our-self in the excellent customer service we provide and the many long term customers who shop at our store. If you’re a camera enthusiast visiting New York for the first time, or if you live in the big apple and have never been to our store, stop by! We’d love to help you.

42nd Street Photo is a Digital Camera Store, located in 378 5th Avenue ( between 35th and 36th St. ) New York, NY 10018.

As one of the top-rated photography, video and audio equipment superstores in New York, 42nd Street Photo is known all over the world for their attentive, knowledgeable sales team, and outstanding customer service, including fast, reliable shipping anywhere in the world. 42nd Street Photo has been satisfying customers worldwide for close to 50 years.
